table.name: civicrm_task_status
table.comment: Tracks the responsible entity, optional target entity and status of a task. Tasks can have multiple task_status entries if assigned to multiple responsible entities and-or there are multiple targets.

field.name: responsible_entity_table
field.comment: Entity responsible for this task_status instance (table where entity is stored e.g. civicrm_contact or civicrm_group).

field.name: responsible_entity_id
field.title: Responsible
field.comment: Foreign key to responsible entity (contact, group, etc.).

field.name: target_entity_table
field.comment: Optional target entity for this task_status instance, i.e. review this membership application-prospect member contact record is target (table where entity is stored e.g. civicrm_contact or civicrm_group).

field.name: target_entity_id
field.title: Target
field.comment: Foreign key to target entity (contact, group, etc.).

field.name: status_detail
field.title: Status Details
field.comment: Encoded array of status details used for programmatic progress reporting and tracking.

field.name: status_id
field.title: Status
field.comment: Configurable status value (e.g. Not Started, In Progress, Completed, Deferred...). FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: create_date
field.title: Created
field.comment: Date this record was created (date work on task started).

field.name: modified_date
field.title: Last Modified
field.comment: Date-time of last update to this task_status record.
